name: One Thousand and One Nights (Akiba)
description:
A short VN developed for the TugaJam, for tugas, by tugas. Written on five hours of sleep.

This submission doesn't have any proper audio, but I do have a recommended listening playlist, not sorted in any order.

  • Steve Reich - Mallet Quartet
  • Eiko Ishibashi - Agloe
  • Cornelius - Music
  • Caifanes - Matenme Porque Me Muero
  • Rei Harakami - long time
